kit.leader_skill: "Bond of Friendship" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%

super_attack.name: Energy Shot (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Massively raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage; Seals Super Attack; A high chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Cheelai's Consideration
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +3; (Forever) DEF 339% up; (Forever) Foresees enemy's Super Attack; (Forever) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres; (Forever) Great chance of evading enemy's attack; (Forever) All allies' Ki +3, ATK & DEF 39% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up (self excluded); For every attack evaded: DEF 139% up within the turn; Every time the character evades 3 attacks in battle: Recovers 39% HP at the end of turn (up to 3 times); After evading 6 or more attacks in battle: (Once) All allies' ATK & DEF 39% up for 3 turns (self excluded); When receiving a normal attack: DEF 139% up temporarily; When receiving a Super Attack: Chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up temporarily

lines.text: Ki +3
DEF 339% up
Foresees enemy's Super Attack
Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres
Great chance of evading enemy's attack
All allies' Ki +3, ATK & DEF 39% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up (self excluded)
DEF 139% up within the turn
Recovers 39% HP at the end of turn (up to 3 times)
lines.context: Every time the character evades 3 attacks in battle

lines.text: All allies' ATK & DEF 39% up for 3 turns (self excluded)
lines.context: After evading 6 or more attacks in battle

lines.text: DEF 139% up temporarily
Chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up temporarily
